description:
New downloadable content (Party Harder Pack) is coming to Party Party Time!
10 brand new head-to-head minigames!
Get the gang together and keep the party going!

The Party Harder Pack includes the following content:

10 New Minigames:
- Twirling Disks
- Robot Watch
- Go Go Race
- Conveyor Run
- Punch Fighter
- Boot the Bomb
- Air Hockey Rumble
- Block Slicer
- Escape Zone
- Labyrinth Escape
name: Party Harder Pack
